inclusion.criterion: Newly acquired HCV infection of 6 months or less duration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Detectable HCV RNA at study entry
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or intent to become pregnant within 24 weeks of study completion
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 55-year-old man with HCV and HBV coinfection, on treatment for 6 months. No other significant medical history.
